name: Residence Inn Lexington Keeneland / Airport

reviews.text: We stayed with another family for T-Day weekend. All four kids were treated with kindness by the staff, and we were made to feel pampered throughout. Housekeeping even called before going home for the day once to make sure we didn't need anything because we'd had our 'no service needed' sign out all day. Wow. The tennis/bball court outside was great for getting kids outside, breakfast hot and much nicer than the usual free morning meal, and the rooms are gorgeous. Be aware the kitchens don't have ovens, but the microwave got us through. Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Brand-new luxury

reviews.text: We absolutely loved this Hotel!! Our daughter was in a golf tournament at the University of Kentucky and we had booked 2 rooms, one for our family and another for our friends. The 1st impression from the time we had stepped into their lobby to check-in was "WOW" and progressed to "This place is Amazing!" The staff was helpful in everyway, we had ordered online an extra roll away bed, when we arrived we were told they didn't carry roll aways. They were very apologetic and tried everything in their power to make it right.
reviews.title: Hotel has everything...Service...Convenience...Outstanding Hotel!

reviews.text: ACTIVITIES: Traveling with teenagers, it was nice that they had they indoor pool, excellent work out room, and the big hit was the basketball court (front desk provided the basketball).
reviews.title: What a great place if you need/want a 2-bedroom, 2-bath suite!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here one night and if I ever return to Lexington this is right where I'll head for accommodations. Spotless and well-located,with staff members that knew their stuff. The only issue we had was that the doors between the 3 main areas were different sizes and you couldn't walk between the areas without having to do a little 'dance' around them...but that's the contractors' fault.
reviews.title: Definitely the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This property is special.The reception staff is wonderful. They are friendly, fun and competent. In the morning a tall gentleman greeted us like old friends. The breakfast is beautifully displayed and has a good variety. In the evening their are also treats. They said this hotel is a year old and it is hard to believe. The place is beautiful. The room is a small apartment with full kitchen. The sitting area is modern and fresh. Parking is plentiful and near your room. Nice restaurants are within walking distance and the airport a fifteen minute drive.
reviews.title: We Want to Live Here

reviews.text: Marriott has nailed it with this room set up. The rooms are comfortable, clean, and efficient. The best part? The TV is able to rotate on a swivel so regardless of which part of the room you are in, you can view it. Sounds silly but it made a HUGE difference. You don't feel like you're in a hotel. It's like an actual apartment. The kitchen is outfitted fully and the staff have been beyond nice. Also, they have breakfast each morning - the good kind, not the cheap stuff, as well as a reception each evening. I actually like coming to this place for work.
reviews.title: Well worth the money

reviews.text: We had a beautiful trip here! The front desk people were perfectly perfect and the rooms were spotless!! :) We will be back in the near future for sure!! Thanks SO much!!
reviews.title: What a GREAT time!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a frequent visitor to Marriott properties, we can truly say this one is right at the top. It has the feel of a large hotel without the hurried hassle you sometimes get when staying in one.
reviews.title: First Class Value

reviews.text: the pool is indoor however your room key allows you access to the nearby Y and all their facilities but I did not see a sign by the desk that indicated that. I agree heat/cool was inconsistent. we did have a stove complete with oven - if that is a priority request a room with both - our room had a separate living area & bedroom. At the end of the hallway far away from elevator but stairs right there and since we were on the 2nd floor we used those. Staff was amazing - outgoing. Will definetly stay on our next trip to Lexington
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

reviews.text: This hotel for our travels was in a great location--nice neighborhood, close to restaurants, and connecting highways to access different areas around Lexington. The staff is very
reviews.title: Loved this hotel, would stay again!

reviews.text: well trained and so attentive. Rooms are extremely nice and spacious--would definitely stay
reviews.title: Best Yet

reviews.text: This is a new and very nice Residence Inn. The beds are comfy and the rooms contemporary and clean. My room on the second floor was quiet and easy to sleep in. In other words, this is a top notch inn. And, it has flat screens in the room. It also is within five miles of the airport.
reviews.title: Confortable, spacious, and great for family travel

aka: Residence Inn Lexington Keeneland / Airport Hotel Lexington
description: When in Lexington come stay with us at our brand new luxurious Residence Inn by Marriott in the Beaumont Centre. This Lexington hotel is conveniently located at the intersection of Harrodsburg Rd and New Circle Rd. The Fayette Mall is only 2 miles away with Downtown Lexington, Rupp Arena, University of Kentucky, Commonwealth Stadium, Keeneland Racetrack and the Bluegrass Airport all less than 10 minutes away.
